attributes.action: introduce a direct link from Shropshire to London and ensure that any franchise agreement is of suffient length to allow the necessary investment needed and that the Office of Rail Regulator (ORR) ensures that discussions about network capacity include an identification of the needs of rural counties like Shropshire and not just urban centres like Birmingham and that any new rail timetable include the historic district centre of Wellington.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
